content: to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch 40 double_crochet round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 2 sts insert stitch marker in the 2nd double_crochet just made double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet s in next st chain-2 skip chain-2 space * 2 double_crochet s in first st double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet s in last st chain-2 skip chain-2 space * repeat around from * to * join to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch finish off 56 double_crochet round 6 join color a in marked st with a slip_stitch remove stitch marker chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in same st * chain 3 skip 3 sts skip chain-2 space single_crochet in first st chain 3 skip 2 sts single_crochet in next st chain 3 skip 2 sts single_crochet in last st chain 3 skip chain-2 space skip 3 sts ** 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * 2 times and from * to ** once join to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch 24 double_crochet 12 single_crochet 20 chain-3 sps round 7 slip_stitch to corner chain 4 2 treble_crochet chain 3 3 treble_crochet in same space * chain 1 3 treble_crochet in first chain-3 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 in next chain-3 space repeat once 3 treble_crochet chain 1 in last chain-3 space ** 3 treble_crochet chain 3 3 treble_crochet in corner space * repeat form * to * 2 times and from * to ** once join to top of beginning chain-4 with a slip_stitch finish off 48 treble_crochet 48 double_crochet stop here if you want an 8 x 8 square round 8 join color b in any corner with a slip_stitch chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * chain 1 skip 1 st 3 double_crochet s in center double_crochet skip 1 st skip chain-1 space repeat 5 times chain 1 ** 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * repeat from * to * 2 times and from * to ** once join to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch 96 double_crochet round 9 slip_stitch to corner chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * chain 1 skip 1 st 3 double_crochet s in center double_crochet skip 1 st repeat 7 times chain 1 ** 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * repeat from * to * 2 times and from * to ** once join to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch 120 double_crochet stop here if you want a 10 x 10 square round 10 slip_stitch to corner chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in corner * skip 1 st double_crochet in next 2 sts chain 1 skip chain-1 space double_crochet in next 3 sts chain 1 skip chain-1 space double_crochet in next 3 sts chain 1 repeat 7 times skip chain-1 space double_crochet in next 2 sts
